node.html:
• Developed and maintained Magento 2.X and Adobe Commerce websites
  • Customized Magento themes and modules to meet specific client requirements, enhancing website functionality and user experience
  • Implemented Axerve and Dojo payment solutions within Magento/Adobe Commerce, ensuring secure and seamless transaction processing
  • Led the migration of various e-commerce platforms to Magento, overseeing all aspects of the project from planning to deployment
  • Built custom Magento modules to extend core functionality and address unique business needs
  • Optimized database queries (MySQL) to improve website performance and scalability
  • Resolved critical production issues related to Magento and Adobe Commerce, minimizing downtime and ensuring business continuity
  • Developed and implemented RESTful APIs to integrate Magento/Adobe Commerce with ERP systems (e.g., Merlin, Exact Online), automating key business processes and reducing manual data entry

• Developed and customized modules/extensions for e-commerce website platforms based on Magento 2 and Magento 1
  • Troubleshooted and resolved various technical issues, including bugs related to customizations, theme conflicts, compatibility problems, version discrepancies, and installation errors
  • Leveraged and customized Magento 2 APIs to enhance website functionality and integration with external systems
